title: list of Dailys seems to be wrong

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: I’m pretty sure this is being caused by dailies being flagged as HoT/non-HoT, and that flag isn’t currently exposed via the API. There’s an open issue for this, I need to go back and see what the current state of my implementation is (it fell off my radar, I think).

comments.author: Inculpatus cedo.9234
comments.body: Could also be for those accounts with low-level characters only. Not sure, didn’t check the Wiki or other accounts.

comments.author: Illconceived Was Na.9781
comments.body:
This could explain why non-HoT players can’t put the non-HoT daily on their watchlist. For example, today, it was Heart of Maguuma Vista (HoT) and Kryta Vista (non-HoT) — HoTtentots could mark the first on their watchlist; ‘CoLDplayers’ could not mark theirs.

FYI Daily Kryta Vista counts for those who haven’t bought HoT yet.

comments.author: Nokomis.5076
comments.body:
Hello everyone,

The current list (https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/achievements/daily) lists achievement 1839 twice. The thing is: Daily Kryta Vista Viewer isn’t even one of the dailys today. And it also doesn’t count if you do it. There are some more PvE dailys listed, which don’t count. And every day the list changes and lists too many points.

The jumping puzzle which would be a daily today isn’t listed at all and from what I could see, the jumping puzzle isn’t listed at all inside all the 2455 achievements currently available. I only was able to found 13 of the 46 jumping puzzles available.
